rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with ample natural light and ventilation adhering to Vastu principles. Features a welcoming foyer for guests.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: spacious open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen and dining space. Promotes natural lighting with large windows.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Dining
rooms.description: Eco-friendly kitchen integrated with dining space. Equipped with energy-efficient appliances and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. Placed in a quiet zone as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed for family members or guests. Located in a private zone.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort. Adheres to eco-friendly materials.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom providing space for extended family or as a guest room.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: A compact yet comfortable bedroom suitable for children or guests.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: Smallest bedroom designed as a guest room or study space with eco-friendly design elements.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-equipped bathroom for guests with eco-friendly fixtures and ample ventilation.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Integrated swimming pool area designed as a feature space on the ground floor corner plot enhancing the aesthetics.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Large windows to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Balconies for rooms that provide access to the rooftop terrace, ensuring proper orientation and air circulation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: A dedicated master bedroom with additional storage space and a private balcony.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom designed to offer privacy with natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A well-designed bedroom with eco-friendly fixtures and ample space for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy with access to a small balcony.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed for quiet productivity and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Efficient storage area integrated into the first floor for better space management.

openings.description: Access to the rooftop terrace via the first floor.
Large windows for optimal natural light, following eco-friendly design practices.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A spacious rooftop terrace providing an open-air living space with green elements, a garden area and seating zones. Adheres to sustainable design principles.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the first floor to the rooftop terrace.
